explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`lineItems`.`product`') END

statements: SELECT p.customerId, lineItems.product FROM purchase p UNNEST p.lineItems WHERE lineItems.product LIKE 'product28%' AND p.test_id = 'unnest' AND p.customerId = 'customer684'

testcase: UNNEST SCAN, covered, GROUP BY, no index filter

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`filter` IS MISSING AND v.`index_group_aggs` IS NOT MISSING END

statements: SELECT p.customerId, lineItems.product, COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM purchase p UNNEST p.lineItems WHERE lineItems.product LIKE 'product28%' AND p.test_id = 'unnest' GROUP BY p.customerId, lineItems.product ORDER BY cnt DESC, lineItems.product LIMIT 4

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`lineItems`.`product`') END

statements: SELECT p.customerId, lineItems.product FROM purchase p UNNEST p.lineItems WHERE lineItems.product LIKE '%roduct28%' AND p.test_id = 'unnest' AND p.customerId = 'customer684' AND p.type = 'purchase'
